name: Crabs In Troubles
description:
======= Game Made During Mini Jam 30 (GAMEBOY THEME) =======

This game does not pretend to be a real GameBoy Game at all. There is a bunch of things here that a GameBoy can't do. We were inspired by the theme, and wanted to make a fun and arcade game, keeping an old-school style and the color variations of a GameBoy.

Description

Catch a friend and play this coop survival shooter game (or singleplayer game if you are really good at multi-tasking ! Or alone), with crabs. And bombs. And water lasers. What are you waiting for?

In Crabs in Troubles you will need to cooperate to survive as long as possible. To achieve this goal, you have some tools : 

          - Two BEAUTIFUL majestic crabs
          - The ability to fire and/or charge WATER LASERS to destroy obstacles. But only at 90° (you are crabs !!).
So, take care of obstacles while covering your friend, while he is doing the same for you. It's a question of global vision. And even if it's slow, take care, it can be vicious.
WARNING : YOU NEED TO BE ON THE EXACT SAME LINE OF AN OBSTACLE TO DESTROY IT WITH YOUR LASER
Left player : C to shoot
Right Player : P to shoot

          - Some Three INCREDIBLE SUPERPOWERS. You can equip at the beginning of each game :

            • THE JUMP : Your crab will jump, allowing it to avoid obstacles for 2 seconds
            cooldown : 10 seconds

           • THE BOMB : Your crab will drop a nuclear package a bomb on the ground, destroying all obstacles in the screen !
            cooldown : 90 seconds (yeah. But this ability is OVERPOWERED when well used. Its power will be lowered in future patches)

          • THE TRACTOR BEAM : Your crab will crab grab all things found.
          cooldown : 8 seconds

          Left player : V to use your special power
          Right Player : O to use your special power

        - 3 SUSHI that represent your life points.

Currently, those little crabs only have those tools (we build the game with a few features for this Mini Jam 30). But, we already imagined some improvements !

Let us know your opinion on the game, a suggestion, and your best score !

Controls

Left Player : AWSD or ZQSD to move, C to shoot, V to use your special power 

Right Player : arrows key to move, P to shoot, O to use your special power.
